_metadata.purpose: Golden test data for TASK-104 plain text ALL CAPS speaker verification
notes: Tests plain text format with ALL CAPS speaker pattern (SPEAKER followed by newline)
Speaker name on its own line, followed by their utterance
No timestamps available (null for start_ms and end_ms)

segments.speaker: ALICE
segments.text: Welcome everyone to the quarterly review.
segments.raw_text:
ALICE
Welcome everyone to the quarterly review.

segments.speaker: BOB
segments.text: Thanks Alice. Let me share the metrics.
segments.raw_text:
BOB
Thanks Alice. Let me share the metrics.

segments.speaker: CHARLIE
segments.text: The numbers look good this quarter.
segments.raw_text:
CHARLIE
The numbers look good this quarter.

segments.speaker: ALICE
segments.text: Agreed. Revenue is up fifteen percent.
segments.raw_text:
ALICE

segments.speaker: ALICE
segments.text: The new features we launched in Q2.
